subject: re:Best rates on drug, shipping worldwide
body:
Dear valued member.
With this special pharmaceutical bulletin we introduce MyCanadianPharmacy providing high quality products at low cost.

Absolutely low prices. Perfect service High level of security.
Sincerely yours,Yasleen Williams
